meetings.title: Thierry Meeting: Credit System & Operations
meetings.agenda: Review credit system payment timing, bill of lading process, customer data requirements, and compliance rules for restricted countries

questions.question: How does the credit system work? If Morichal pays 30% for production to start when the PO is sent, when does Morichal pay the remaining 70%? Is it when production is finished or when it arrives at port?
questions.notes: Critical for understanding cash flow and payment scheduling in the platform

questions.question: If the client pays 30% to start the order, when does the client pay the remaining 70%?
questions.notes: Need to understand client payment milestones vs Morichal payment milestones

questions.question: Do we specify the freight cost on the proforma when payment is in credit?
questions.notes: Affects how proforma invoices are generated for credit transactions

questions.question: When is the Bill of Lading generated? After it's shipped, when it lands, or at another point?
questions.notes: Important for the Logistics Milestone Agent timeline

questions.question: Can you provide us a list of customers with their credit line amounts and remaining credit?
questions.notes: ACTION: Request data export from Morichal for initial system population

questions.question: Some countries are restricted by US (like Venezuela). When a user selects a company service for TRD for a Venezuela company, should it automatically convert to Morichal when generating the Commercial Invoice?
questions.notes: Compliance Agent logic: auto-convert restricted country orders to Morichal entity

questions.question: Every new customer needs documents, but old customers have docs already. Does Morichal have the old customers' documents so we can add them to the system? Or should we add a feature to manually verify old customers?
questions.notes: Document Verification Agent: need to handle legacy customer data migration

actionItems.title: Request customer credit data export
actionItems.description: Ask Thierry to provide a list of customers with credit lines and remaining credit for initial system population
